topic.title: How to Hide Tracked Change Footnotes

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

keywords.indexterm: DITA Map to PDF WYSIWYG Transformation Tracked changesHide footnotes

body.p: This topic is relevant if you have set the show.changes.and.comments.as.pdf.sticky.notes transformation parameter to no, and therefore the changes are shown as footnotes instead of PDF annotations.
